content.text: Mr. GARAMENDI. Mr. Speaker, I move that the House do now adjourn.
content.speaker: Mr. GARAMENDI

content.text:
The motion was agreed to; accordingly (at 8 o'clock and 38 minutes 
p.m.), under its previous order, the House adjourned until tomorrow, 
Wednesday, November 8, 2017, at 10 a.m. for morning-hour debate.
content.speaker: The RECORDER
